thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 11 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Kingdom Sci-Tech's Investment In Blockchain Technology Is Still In Initial Stages

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Kingdom Sci-Tech's Investment In Blockchain Technology Is Still In Initial Stages

organizations.name: reuters) - shenzhen kingdom sci-tech co ltd

text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Shenzhen Kingdom Sci-Tech Co Ltd :
* SAYS ITS INVESTMENT IN BLOCKCHAIN TECHNOLOGY IS STILL IN INITIAL STAGES AND WILL NOT HAVE HUGE IMPACT ON ITS BOTTOMLINE, RESPONDING TO RECENT SHARE PRICE SWINGS Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2Fqv4CR Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
